entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a creature with large, bat-like ears and bulging green eyes. He is wearing an old pillowcase as clothing.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who has been watching by Dobby in the garden hedge that morning.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin, whose voice can be heard from the hall.

entities.name: mrs mason
entities.description: Mrs Mason is a person who is being referred to by Dudley in his greeting.

entities.name: mr mason
entities.description: Mr Mason is a person who is being referred to by Dudley in his greeting.

relationships.description: Dobby and Harry Potter meet each other for the first time, with Dobby expressing his excitement to finally meet Harry.
Dudley greets Mrs Mason in the hall, asking if he can take their coats.
